==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|朽|木|糞|牆}}

===Etymology===
From {{etyl|ltc|ja}} [[朽木糞牆]]

===Idiom===
{{ja-pos|idiom|きゅうぼくふんしょう}}

# A piece of rotten wood cannot be turned into something beautiful. That is, a person whose spirit is rotten cannot benefit from education.

* [[w:Kōjien|The Kōjien (広辞苑) Dictionary of the Japanese Language]], 5th edition, Iwanami Shoten Publishing, Tokyo.
